contents.text: Thank you for calling Nylas, the San Francisco-based API provider for email, calendar, and contacts synchronization.
To speak with a sales representative, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative in our San Francisco office.

navigationGoals: Get a customized enterprise pricing quote and discuss volume discounts
I’d like to speak with a sales representative about enterprise pricing for my veteran-run app.
I need to discuss enterprise-tier API rate limits and pricing options with a sales representative.
I’m interested in buying your API service and need to speak with someone about pricing.
Ask a sales representative for academic pricing and feature details for a student project using the Nylas API

contents.text: Please hold for a partnership specialist, who will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: Explore a technology integration partnership with Nylas
I’m interested in discussing partnership opportunities between my veteran-focused non-profit and Nylas.
I want to explore a white-label partnership and co-marketing integration for the Nylas synchronization APIs.
I would like to discuss a potential partnership opportunity with your company.
Explore a collaboration between Nylas and my university physics lab to integrate email and calendar sync into our research platform

contents.text: For technical support with our email, calendar, and contacts APIs, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our technical support team.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a calendar‐sync API error I’m seeing in production
I need technical support to troubleshoot my calendar sync API integration.
I’m troubleshooting OAuth token refresh failures in the Nylas email sync API and need technical assistance.
I need technical support to help me set up or fix my email and calendar synchronization.
Troubleshoot a Python integration issue where the Nylas calendar API is returning incorrect timezone offsets for scheduled events

contents.text: For account management and billing, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our account management team.

navigationGoals: Update my billing info and request last month’s invoice
I have questions about my latest invoice and need help with billing and account management.
I need to upgrade my API subscription, review usage overage charges, and update my billing method.
I need assistance with my account billing and managing my subscription.
Upgrade my Nylas account plan and update billing information to support higher API usage for my project
